metadata.title: W3Schools.com
metadata.Keywords: HTML, Python, CSS, SQL, JavaScript, How to, PHP, Java, C, C++, C#, jQuery, Bootstrap, Colors, W3.CSS, XML, MySQL, Icons, NodeJS, React, Graphics, Angular, R, AI, Git, Data Science, Code Game, Tutorials, Programming, Web Development, Training, Learning, Quiz, Exercises, Courses, Lessons, References, Examples, Learn to code, Source code, Demos, Tips, Website
metadata.Description: Well organized and easy to understand Web building tutorials with lots of examples of how to use HTML, CSS, JavaScript, SQL, Python, PHP, Bootstrap, Java, XML and more.
metadata.og:description: W3Schools offers free online tutorials, references and exercises in all the major languages of the web. Covering popular subjects like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, SQL, Java, and many, many more.
metadata.keywords: HTML, Python, CSS, SQL, JavaScript, How to, PHP, Java, C, C++, C#, jQuery, Bootstrap, Colors, W3.CSS, XML, MySQL, Icons, NodeJS, React, Graphics, Angular, R, AI, Git, Data Science, Code Game, Tutorials, Programming, Web Development, Training, Learning, Quiz, Exercises, Courses, Lessons, References, Examples, Learn to code, Source code, Demos, Tips, Website

content.text: The RIGHT JOIN command returns all rows from the right table, and the matching records from the left table. The result is NULL from the left side, when there is no match.
content.html: The RIGHT JOIN command returns all rows from the right table, and the matching records from the left table. The result is NULL from the left side, when there is no match.

content.text: The following SQL will return all employees, and any orders they might have placed:
content.html: The following SQL will return all employees, and any orders they might have placed:

syntaxHighlighting.text:
SELECT Orders.OrderID, Employees.LastName, Employees.FirstNameFROM OrdersRIGHT JOIN Employees ON Orders.EmployeeID = Employees.EmployeeID
 ORDER BY Orders.OrderID;

content.code:
SELECT Orders.OrderID, Employees.LastName, Employees.FirstNameFROM OrdersRIGHT JOIN Employees ON Orders.EmployeeID = Employees.EmployeeID
ORDER BY Orders.OrderID;

syntax_highlighting.text:
SELECT Orders.OrderID, Employees.LastName, Employees.FirstNameFROM OrdersRIGHT JOIN Employees ON Orders.EmployeeID = Employees.EmployeeID
 ORDER BY Orders.OrderID;

content.code_html:
SELECT Orders.OrderID, Employees.LastName, Employees.FirstName
FROM Orders
RIGHT JOIN Employees ON Orders.EmployeeID = Employees.EmployeeID
ORDER BY Orders.OrderID;

syntax_highlighting_data.text:
SELECT Orders.OrderID, Employees.LastName, Employees.FirstNameFROM OrdersRIGHT JOIN Employees ON Orders.EmployeeID = Employees.EmployeeID
 ORDER BY Orders.OrderID;

content.text: Note: The RIGHT JOIN keyword returns all records from the right table (Employees), even if there are no matches in the left table (Orders).
content.html: Note: The RIGHT JOIN keyword returns all records from the right table (Employees), even if there are no matches in the left table (Orders).
